data.title: Mega Drive) Playthrough
data.meta_description:
This is a playthrough of the Genesis / Mega Drive version of the arcade game "Double Dragon". This is being played on my actual Sega Genesis Model 2 VA0 connected to a Framemeister, captured via an Elgato Game Capture HD.

My Personal Rating:
Graphics: B-
Music/Sounds: C-
Gameplay: D-
Controls: D+
Replayability: D-
Final Grade: D

Developers: Technos Japan (original), Accolade (Genesis / MD version)
Publisher: Ballistic
Year: 1986 (original), 1992 (Genesis / MD version)
Platforms: Arcade, Genesis/Mega Drive, Master System, NES, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, PC (MS-DOS), Atari ST, Amiga, Atari 2600, Atari 7800, Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, Atari Lynx, Zeebo, Xbox 360, PlayStation 4, iOS, Android

This is only for the sake of entertainment. No copyright infringement intended.
